features: BUNDLE INCLUDES: We’ve combined the 3” Raised toilet seat with built-in Clean Shield, support arms and bidet attachment for the ultimate clean package

COMFORT: Seat height is increased/elevated by 3" and support arms help ease sitting and standing for those with limited mobility from back, hip or knee issues; seat is designed to eliminate painful pressure point contact
REFRESHING SPRAY OPTIONS: The innovative bidet attachment is easy to control with a twist of the dial to adjust water pressure
SEAT SECURITY: Spacious 21" width between the ADA compliant support arms fits in all bathrooms and provides comfortable width for the user; the heavy-duty, solid plastic seat is tested to 1,000 lbs
NO WIGGLE: Your seat will not loosen with our patented Snap 2 Secure system engineered to maintain a properly secured seat; self-sustaining hinges keep the seat up to prevent slamming
SPLASH PROTECTION: Innovative, "reverse funnel" design of the Clean Shield keeps everything in the bowl avoiding contact with waste
BUILT TO LAST: Bidet attachment features a quality design brass valve and inlet, alongside a braided metal water supply hose and certified built-in check valve built to last
EASY INSTALLATION: The seat, support arms and bidet attachment are all designed to fit perfectly together with easy DIY installation
body.description: The BEMIS Clean Shield - the gold standard in raised toilet seats - has gotten cleaner! Introducing the NEW Bemis Clean Shield and Bidet bundle from Bemis Independence. The Clean Shield Elevated/Raised toilet seat is elevated 3" to make sitting and standing easier. Now with an innovative bidet attachment and Support Arms, this Clean Shield seat is unlike any other raised toilet seat. The shield under the ring keeps everything in the bowl and is easy to clean unlike other raised toilet seats or risers. Wide, comfortable ring designed to eliminate pressure points while keeping you clean. Use the support arms to make your experience sitting down comfortable and safe. The seat has a weight capacity of 1000 lbs. You can trust the seat is securely fastened with the Snap 2 Secure system (installation tool included) to eliminate concerns about falling. A secure seat is critical to your independence.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality as advertised,
reviews.reviewText: This is a great product! Just as advertised. Sturdy, Easy to install, quality materials. The handrails are great, truly supportive and not wobbly. Haven't had to clean it yet , since just installed today, but looks easy to clean. Definitely would recommend. Very pleased. Worth the extra money. Will update if otherwise.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Even better than advertised
reviews.reviewText: I can’t believe how I got along without this before! The sturdy arms are alone worth the price as they make getting on and off so much easier, but the extra height means I can easily use the toilet by myself, while previously I had found myself stranded there. The seat top is also large and sturdy so I can sit on it to dress myself, and I weigh 220#. Handsome lines and easily cleanable as well as easily installed. Got one for our second bathroom as well!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: What a great toilet seat. I bought this for my mother. She was having difficulty getting up from the toilet and she can't have knee replacement surgery due to her health.My mom likes her independence so asking for assistance is not her strong suit. This toilet seat helps her keep her independence.This seat is wide, has 3" of added height, it's extremely sturdy, easy to install, and looks great. I love the wide rim which catches any splashes. This seat has style and functionality; so much better than the old bulky white seat.Love it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It does what you need it to do!
reviews.reviewText: After buying 2 of the “blowmolded” pieces of junk you will also see on Amazon I purchased this Bemis raised toilet seat. IT IS THE BEST ONE YOU WILL FIND! The Bemis name meant a lot when it comes to QUALITY.This seat fits right, is built right and the grab handles are 2” further apart than the “ blowmolded” junk you will find out there. Not to mention the ability to flip it up for cleaning. The installation couldn’t have been easier, comes with everything you need. Yes , it costs more than the “blowmolded” junk, trust me, it is worth every penny. One last thing, it will actually safely support an adult!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Excellent Support. Easy Install.
reviews.reviewText: Would have given 4.5 stars instead of 4 if that were an option. Got this for my husband post knee replacement surgery. So easy for me to install. Only challenge was reaching under the seat with the provided tool. Very awkward and can’t see but I managed. Solid, sturdy design. Fits our elongated toilet perfectly. Wish handles gave better support/ less wobbly when the seat is up for him standing to use toilet. Only had a little urine escape down the side of toilet once while seated. Could use a little longer splash guard in front but again, only happened once so far. Very pleased with the product. Cleans up easily as well. Highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worth every penny!
reviews.reviewText: The install was very easy with great instructions. Very sturdy and easy to clean.I’m glad I spent the extra money to buy this seat with handles.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This fit our standard size toilet with no problem. Easy to install, my wife had knee surgery and this is a must for anyone having this issue. This seat is very well made and is not wobbly or in any way scarry to place all of you weight on the hand rails. It is worth the money and I buy again if I need to.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best one out there,
reviews.reviewText: Did a lot of research before buying for my elderly sister. This unit goes on and comes off very easily. It is completely stable, as it has multiple supports under the seat and the shield keeps the gap between seat and bowl covered, so cleaner than other types. I bought the optional arms and like that I can use just one, as her bathroom is small. It is a great height and lots of room between arms for easy on and off. Like that nothing touches the floor, so nothing to move when mopping. Highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Only fitted yesterday but the quality and build feels very good and sturdy. Be sure to measure your toilet pan before ordering, to ensure it will fit. We like that the whole thing can be lifted up like a normal toilet seat, giving access to the pan as normal. Recommended.

We got this Bemis raised toilet seat to replace one I bought last fall for my mother-in-law which because of its design could not be securely fastened to the toilet bowl and wobbled back and forth anytime it was used. The bolts were long and passed through 2 shafts to connect to the toilet tank. I did my research, checked the feedback for this product and looked at its design before I purchased it. The installation took less than 15 minutes and required a lot of turning to fasten the bolts in place which was slow because I had to bend down and look at the underside of the top of the bowl but I persevered. So far, we are happy with the purchase as the seat has not moved. There is a gap between the seat and bowl which will make it easier for cleaning the area between the two. Thank you to Bemis for making such a wonderful product. Don’t waste your money on other raised toilet seats.
Absolutely the best raised toilet seat!! Highly recommend. Easy to install. Easy to clean. Perfect.

reviews.reviewTitle: It is not an universal fit for any Elongated Toilet.
reviews.reviewText: The Bemis Raised Seat material is excellent. However, it did not fit my American Standard Elongated Toilet,because the Bemis Installation Snap 2 Secure System "craked" my pristine Toilet. . . therefore.. Diaster. . .Now I have to find 1. a Plumber to remove the Seat and 2. install a New Toilet ! !Update : Bemis Mftg offered to reimburse the Plumbing Cost of the new toilet plus installation.
